amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language making the NATO participation program mandatory.
amendment.purpose: An amendment (numbered 48 as printed in the Congressional Record) to strike the bill's provision making the NATO participation program mandatory. The current program permits (but does not require) the President to establish an assistance program to upgrade the military forces of European nations emerging from Communist domination to facilitate their transition to full NATO membership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torricelli amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 232 (Roll no. 143).
